articles.title: Herdman reflects, takes blame following Canada's World Cup loss to Croatia - Sportsnet.ca
articles.description: "I'll take it on the chin," John Herdman said after being asked about his much spoken about comments regarding Croatia. Following his loss to the European side, he had to confront his words head-on.
articles.content: Canada's men's national team head coach John Herdman talks to the media about the comments he made following their match against Belgium when he said they were going to 'eff Croatia,' saying that he … [+27 chars]
